name: accordion
description: Collapse and expand sections of content. Perfect for FAQs and content-heavy areas.

props.name: variant
props.description: When set to 'reverse', displays the icon before the heading instead of after it

props.name: transition
props.description: If true, enables expanding transitions for smoother interactions

props.name: exclusive
props.description: If true, only one accordion item can be expanded at a time

name: accordion.item
description: An individual accordion item.

props.name: expanded
props.description: If true, the accordion item is expanded by default

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the accordion item cannot be expanded or collapsed

name: accordion.heading
description: The heading of an accordion item.

name: accordion.content
description: The content to display when the accordion item is expanded.

name: autocomplete
description: Enhance an input field with autocomplete suggestions.

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the input

props.name: description
props.description: Descriptive text displayed below the label

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text displayed when the input is empty

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, prevents user interaction with the input

props.name: readonly
props.description: If true, makes the input read-only

props.name: invalid
props.description: If true, applies error styling to the input

props.name: multiple
props.description: For file inputs, allows selecting multiple files

props.name: mask
props.description: Input mask pattern using Alpine's mask plugin

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon displayed at the start of the input

props.name: icon:trailing
props.description: Name of the icon displayed at the end of the input

props.name: kbd
props.description: Keyboard shortcut hint displayed at the end of the input

props.name: clearable
props.description: If true, displays a clear button when the input has content

props.name: copyable
props.description: If true, displays a copy button to copy the input's content

props.name: viewable
props.description: For password inputs, displays a toggle to show/hide the password

props.name: as
props.description: Render the input as a different element

name: autocomplete.item
description: An item in the autocomplete dropdown.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If present or true, the item cannot be selected

name: avatar
description: Display an image or initials as an avatar.

props.name: name
props.description: User's name to display as initials

props.name: src
props.description: URL to the image to display as avatar

props.name: initials
props.description: Custom initials to display when no src is provided

props.name: alt
props.description: Alternative text for the avatar image

props.name: color:seed
props.description: Value used when color='auto' to generate consistent colors

props.name: circle
props.description: If true, makes the avatar fully circular

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon to display instead of an image or initials

props.name: tooltip
props.description: Text to display in a tooltip when hovering

props.name: badge
props.description: Content to display as a badge

props.name: badge:circle
props.description: If true, makes the badge fully circular

props.name: href
props.description: URL to link to, making the avatar a link element

name: avatar.group
description: Group multiple avatars together.

props.name: class
props.description: CSS classes to apply to the group

name: badge
description: Highlight information like status, category, or count.

props.name: rounded
props.description: If true, makes the badge fully rounded

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon to display before the badge text

props.name: icon:trailing
props.description: Name of the icon to display after the badge text

name: badge.close
description: Close button for dismissible badges.

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon to display

name: brand
description: Display your company or application's logo and name.

props.name: name
props.description: Company or application name to display next to the logo

props.name: logo
props.description: URL to the image to display as logo

props.name: href
props.description: URL to navigate to when the brand is clicked

name: breadcrumbs
description: Help users navigate and understand their place within your application.

name: breadcrumbs.item
description: An individual breadcrumb link.

props.name: href
props.description: URL the breadcrumb item links to

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon to display

props.name: separator
props.description: Name of the icon to display as the separator

name: button
description: A powerful and composable button component for your application.

props.name: href
props.description: URL to link to when used as anchor tag

props.name: color
props.description: Color of the primary button (Tailwind color names)

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon at the start

props.name: icon:trailing
props.description: Name of the icon at the end

props.name: square
props.description: If true, makes the button square

props.name: loading
props.description: Show loading spinner with wire:click or type='submit'

name: button.group
description: Group multiple buttons together.

name: calendar
description: A full-featured calendar component for date selection.

props.name: value
props.description: Selected date(s). Format depends on mode

name: callout
description: Highlight important information or guide users toward key actions.

description: Heading for a callout.

props.name: icon
props.description: Moves the icon inside the heading

name: callout.text
description: Text content inside a callout.

name: callout.link
description: Link inside a callout.

props.name: href
props.description: The URL the link points to

props.name: external
props.description: If true, opens in new tab

name: card
description: A container for related content, such as a form, alert, or data list.

description: Display data visualizations with line charts, area charts, and more.

props.description: Array of data points for the chart

description: SVG container for chart visualization.

description: Line visualization for chart.

name: chart.area
description: Area visualization for chart.

name: chart.point
description: Point visualization for chart.

name: chart.axis
description: Axis configuration for chart.

name: checkbox
description: Select one or multiple options from a set.

props.description: Label text displayed next to the checkbox

props.name: value
props.description: Value when used in a group

name: checkbox.group
description: Group multiple checkboxes together.

name: checkbox.all
description: Select all checkbox for a group.

name: command
description: A searchable list of commands.

name: command.input
description: Search input for command palette.

name: command.items
description: Container for command items.

name: command.item
description: An item in the command palette.

name: composer
description: A configurable message input with support for action buttons and rich text.

name: context
description: Dropdown menus that open when right clicking a designated area.

name: date-picker
description: Allow users to select dates or date ranges via a calendar overlay.

props.name: value
props.description: Selected date(s). Format: Y-m-d or Y-m-d/Y-m-d for range

props.name: min-range
props.description: Minimum number of days in range mode

props.name: max-range
props.description: Maximum number of days in range mode

props.name: min
props.description: Earliest selectable date. Can be date string or 'today'

props.name: max
props.description: Latest selectable date. Can be date string or 'today'

props.name: open-to
props.description: Date the picker opens to if no selection

props.name: force-open-to
props.description: Force open to open-to date regardless of selection

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the date picker

props.name: description
props.description: Help text displayed below the date picker

props.name: description:trailing
props.description: Display description below instead of above

props.name: badge
props.description: Badge text displayed at the end of the label

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when no date is selected

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the calendar day cells

props.name: start-day
props.description: Day of week to start (0=Sunday to 6=Saturday)

props.name: week-numbers
props.description: Display week numbers in the calendar

props.name: selectable-header
props.description: Show month/year dropdowns for quick navigation

props.name: with-today
props.description: Display a button to navigate to today's date

props.name: with-inputs
props.description: Display date inputs for manual entry

props.name: presets
props.default: 'today yesterday thisWeek last7Days thisMonth yearToDate allTime'
props.description: Space-separated list of preset date ranges

props.name: clearable
props.description: Display a clear button when a date is selected

props.name: locale
props.description: Locale for the date picker (e.g., fr, en-US, ja-JP)

name: date-picker.input
description: Input trigger for date picker.

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the input

props.name: description
props.description: Help text displayed below the input

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when no date is selected

props.name: clearable
props.description: Display a clear button when a date is selected

name: date-picker.button
description: Button trigger for date picker.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Text displayed when no date is selected

props.name: clearable
props.description: Display a clear button when a date is selected

name: dropdown
description: A composable dropdown component for navigation menus and action menus.

name: editor
description: A basic rich text editor built using ProseMirror and Tiptap.

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the editor

props.name: description
props.description: Help text displayed below the editor

props.name: description:trailing
props.description: Display description below the editor instead of above

props.name: badge
props.description: Badge text displayed at the end of the label

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when the editor is empty

props.name: toolbar
props.description: Space-separated list of toolbar items. Use | for separator and ~ for spacer

name: editor.toolbar
description: Toolbar for the editor.

props.name: items
props.description: Space-separated list of toolbar items to display

name: editor.button
description: Custom button for editor toolbar.

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon to display in the button

props.name: tooltip
props.description: Text to display in a tooltip when hovering

name: editor.content
description: Initial HTML content for the editor.

name: error
description: Error message for form validation.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field to display validation errors for

props.name: bag
props.description: The error bag to get the error from

props.name: deep
props.description: Look for validation errors in nested array fields

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon to display inline with the error message

name: field
description: Encapsulate input elements with labels, descriptions, and validation.

name: fieldset
description: Group related form fields.

props.name: description
props.description: Optional description text for the fieldset

name: file-upload
description: A flexible file upload component with drag-and-drop support, file previews, and Livewire integration.

props.description: The input name attribute for form submissions

props.name: multiple
props.description: Allow selecting and uploading multiple files

props.description: Helper text displayed below the field

props.description: Error message to display for validation failures

props.description: Prevents user interaction with the file upload

props.description: Main text displayed in the dropzone area

props.description: Supporting text displayed below the heading

props.description: Icon name to display in the dropzone

props.name: inline
props.description: Display the dropzone in a compact horizontal layout

props.name: with-progress
props.description: Show a progress bar during file uploads

props.description: The file name or title to display

props.name: image
props.description: URL or path to a preview image for the file

props.name: size
props.description: File size in bytes. Auto-formatted to B, KB, MB, or GB

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon to display when no image is provided

props.name: invalid
props.description: Display the file item in an error state

props.description: If true, applies accent color styling to the heading

name: kanban

props.description: The title text to display in the column header

props.name: subheading
props.description: Optional secondary text below the header

props.name: count
props.description: Number to display next to the heading (e.g., card count)

props.description: Badge text or content to display next to the heading

name: kanban.column.cards
description: Cards container within a kanban column.

description: Footer area of a kanban column.

description: A card/item in the kanban board.

props.description: The title text to display in the card

props.description: Element to render the card as. 'button' makes it clickable

name: label

props.description: Time to open the picker to. Default: selected time, or now
